page.title: 03Malletts P.Y.O Farm & Shop
page.content: This farm covers 21 acres its{ {fruit crops}are strawberries, loganberries, tayberries, blackberries and redcurrants.The vegetable crops are potatoes, courgettes, runner beans and broad beans. The farm is run by 1 full time worker, 4 part-timers and 10-12 casual workers. The majority of the{crops}are sold to people who call in and pick their own quantities of produce, mainly between June and September. An average of 9-12 tons of strawberries are picked yearly. No{produce}is sent to market, a very small amount is sold to local shops.
